City Council
============

Regular Meetings
----------------

[View Agendas & Minutes](https://winnsborotexas.civicweb.net/portal)
--------------------------------------------------------------------

* 2nd Tuesday of the month @ 5:30 pm
* City Hall back entrance  
  501 S Main Street  
  Winnsboro, TX 75494

**Mayor & Council Members**
===========================

### **Mayor**   Mayor Pro-Tem

**Richard Parrish                                                                                        CJ Thatcher****[![Richard Parrish resize](https://winnsborotexas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1034)](mailto:rparrish@winnsborotexas.com)[![Mayor Pro-Tem CJ Thatcher (image)](https://winnsborotexas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=861)](mailto:cthatcher@@winnsborotexas.com)**

**Jim Hollowell****Brenda Morey [![Brenda Morey (image)](https://winnsborotexas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=860)](mailto:bmorey@winnsborotexas.com)[![Jim Hollowell (image)](https://winnsborotexas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=858)](mailto:jhollowell@winnsborotexas.com)**

\* Not pictured:[Trevor King](mailto:tking@winnsborotexas.com), [Stephen Boorman](mailto:sboorman@winnsborotexas.com)
